configure_cancel_message: You will lose any changes you have made to this profile
configure_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
configure_custom_description: Configure and manage detection entries for your customized profile. You can create up to %{max_entries} entries with your account. If you need help, here’s our <0>documentation</0> about DLP profiles.
configure_description: If you need help, here’s our <0>documentation</0> about DLP profiles.
configure_entry_custom_description: You have %{number} / %{max_entries} new custom entries remaining. Contact your account team to request a limit increase.
configure_entry_description: Choose which detection entries you want to apply to uploaded or downloaded files through Gateway HTTP policies.
configure_name_readonly_warning: This field is pre-filled and cannot be changed.
profiles_list_description: Configure Data Loss Prevention profiles to detect whether uploaded or downloaded files contain specific types of information, such as social security numbers and other PII. Then, use <0>Gateway HTTP policies</0> to determine whether you want to allow those files to be transferred.
